column17: Possibilty that chemical may not have been added to all wells due to bravo setting, same for all previous experiments
Screened from 96 to 1 (reverse direction); incubated for one extra day because most eggs had not hatched on day 5
Arrayscan space shortage, hence half run on next day
Bravo crashed on M121-M124Q4, process continued from next plate
De-lidder stopped working. first 30 over plates OD and Images taken on Day 7. Rest of plates, no OD, lids removed and liquid added using wellmate and placed in cytomat, images taken on Day 8- Day 9
Ran out of worms for last Iteration. De-lidder did not work, liquid added using wellmate and imaged usinf Arrayscan manually, no OD reading. Worms were too dilute, added 30ul, final conc is 8.8uM
